attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2012-1112

Date: 2012-09-20

His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of the Environment, pursuant to section 8 of the Heritage Railway Stations Protection Act, authorizes the Hudson Bay Railway Company to transfer ownership, by way of donation, of its railway station in Cranberry Portage, Manitoba, to the Cranberry Portage Heritage Museum Corporation, in accordance with the terms and conditions set out in the attached schedule.


Sur recommandation du ministre de l’Environnement et en vertu de l’article 8 de la Loi sur la protection des gares ferroviaires patrimoniales, Son Excellence le Gouverneur général en conseil autorise la Hudson Bay Railway Company à céder, par voie de donation, sa gare ferroviaire située à Cranberry Portage (Manitoba) à la Cranberry Portage Heritage Museum Corporation, selon les modalités figurant à l’annexe ci-jointe.
attachmentText:
PC Number: 2012-1112Date: 2012-09-20


His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of the Environment, pursuant to section 8 of the Heritage Railway Stations Protection Act, authorizes the Hudson Bay Railway Company to transfer ownership, by way of donation, of its railway station in Cranberry Portage, Manitoba, to the Cranberry Portage Heritage Museum Corporation, in accordance with the terms and conditions set out in the attached schedule.



Sur recommandation du ministre de l’Environnement et en vertu de l’article 8 de la Loi sur la protection des gares ferroviaires patrimoniales, Son Excellence le Gouverneur général en conseil autorise la Hudson Bay Railway Company à céder, par voie de donation, sa gare ferroviaire située à Cranberry Portage (Manitoba) à la Cranberry Portage Heritage Museum Corporation, selon les modalités figurant à l’annexe ci-jointe.
